content: Steel circular saw blade Premium circular saw blade for straight, fast, cold cutting in metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-quality cermet tips for long life and fast, cold cuts in a wide range of metal applications More cuts per charge – the blade’s geometry helps you to cut up to 100% more per battery charge in steel Longer-lasting blades – improved lifetime compared to previous Hilti premium circular saw blades Applications Cold, fast, straight cuts in ferrous metal and structural panels Cutting channel iron, pipe, tubing, threaded rod and rebar Straight cuts through angle iron and steel plate Cutting sandwich panel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Blade features: Clean cut, Cold cut, Economic, Long life, Special for cordless, Cermet tipped Blade diameter: 6.5 in Number of teeth: 40 Technical Data | Blade features | Clean cut, Cold cut, Economic, Long life, Special for cordless, Cermet tipped | Blade diameter | 6.5 in | Number of teeth | 40 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 3895548 - SCBM MU Steel 6.5 (2-pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x Circ. saw blade SCBM MU Steel 6.5
